titles.title: A bill to limit the authority of the Secretary of Energy and the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to use any procedure of expedited consideration in determining whether or not to issue a certificate of public convenience and necessity for construction of certain natural gas pipelines.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 3/5/1987--Introduced. Prohibits the Secretary of Energy and the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission from using expedited procedures when considering whether to issue a certificate of public convenience and necessity for the construction of a natural gas pipeline longer than 25 miles.
